set(GLCTS_ESEXT_LIBS
    glcts-common
    glutil
    tcutil
    )

#set(GLCTS_ESEXT_LIBS ${GLCTS_ESEXT_LIBS} glcts-gtf)

PCH(GLCTS_ESEXT_SRCS ../pch.cpp)

add_library(glcts-esext STATIC ${GLCTS_ESEXT_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(glcts-esext ${GLCTS_ESEXT_LIBS})
